data.Interactability_Reward_3_Text: Perfect! Now let's get that out of your way.
data.Interactability_Reward_4_Text: Moving on, our secondary goal with this project is to not only reverse death, but to cure it!
data.Interactability_Reward_5_Text: Prophylactic examples could be burned, bludgeoned, electrocuted, touching or otherwise consuming corrosive substances, drowning in water or said corrosive substances,
data.Interactability_Reward_6_Text: diseases, and much more. Now you ask, how would we even start with solving any of this?
data.Interactability_Reward_7_Text: Gene splicing! To dumb it down for you, we’ll be cutting up what makes you, you, and swapping some minor or major parts around until we’re golden!
data.Interactability_Reward_8_Text: While it’s risky, given there’s a chance you turn into an eldritch monster on some level for a short…or slightly not as short a moment of time, the benefits far outweigh any negatives!
data.Interactability_Reward_9_Text: Besides, what do we define an eldritch being as? I sure as hell don’t consider sprouting a couple more arms as a negative.
data.Interactability_Reward_10_Text: Oh! That reminds me, you need to sign another few papers.
data.Interactability_Reward_11_Text: Perfect! Now let's get that out of your way.
data.Interactability_Reward_12_Text: Perfect! Now let's get that out of your way.
data.Interactability_Reward_13_Text: Perfect! Now let's get that out of your way.
data.Interactability_Reward_14_Text: Perfect! Now let's get that out of your way.
data.Interactability_Reward_15_Text: Perfect! Now let's get that out of your way.

translation.Name: Buak_Q_S7M1_Papers_Fall
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0:
As a Scorpion-7 volunteer, I hearby promise to never tout bringing the dead back to life is immoral, and want to continue on.
Signed: .

As a Scorpion-7 volunteer, I hearby promise I left the facility in one piece and didn't end up somewhere such as the interior of the ventilation system.
Signed: .
